title: Man attacks doctor in his office in Malaysia accusing him of sleeping with wife
text:
A doctor has been brutally attacked after a furious man stormed into his office, accusing him of sleeping with his wife.

Aiman Ariff Ahmad Amirudin, 31, was captured on video repeatedly kicking and stomping on the head of the physician at his office in Bandar Baru Bangi in Malaysia.

Amirudin claimed his wife Intan, 28, had been cheating on him while he was working in Dubai and became so paranoid that he accessed various CCTV footage that showed the pair together.

The doctor is shown being continuously beaten as he lay helplessly on the floor before a female nurse managed to intervene.

The 31-year-old believed his wife had been cheating on him for eight months and had previously asked for a divorce.

'I'm not crazy about beating people up because I've never had a criminal record before. But who doesn't get mad at the doctor's pride in coming to my house?' the husband said, Malaysian publication Mstar reported.

The doctor is shown being continuously beaten as he lay helplessly on the floor before a female nurse managed to intervene (pictured)

'I don't think this is a jealous issue but it is cheating...the wife of a person cheating on a man. Where is my justice being mistreated,' he said.

Amirudin also said his wife had even blocked his number.

'My wife has been seeking a divorce since the beginning of the year. She also blocked my number for three months'.

He said along with the CCTV footage he had seen, he had evidence of access cards and hotel receipts.

Family members of Intan claimed her husband was very jealous and had warned the doctor to stop being friends with her prior to the attack.

The doctor has since reported the incident to police who are investigating.
description: Aiman Ariff Ahmad Amirudin, 31, was captured on video repeatedly kicking and stomping on the head of the doctor at his office in Bandar Baru Bangi in Malaysia, this week.
authors: Eliza Mcphee For Daily Mail Australia
